title: How to Share a wikiHow Article

steps.headline: Find the wikiHow article you wish to share to Facebook.
Look for, on the right side of the page, a bar that has "Share" and has the four share buttons in it.
steps.description: Click on the blue button that says "Like," with a thumbs up with it.

steps.headline: A new window will pop up, where you will be required to enter your Facebook email and password and enter those.
The window will close, and you're done!
Visit the wikiHow article that you want to share to Pinterest.
Find on the right side of the page, a box with a title of "Share," and then find the button with "Pin It," and click on it.
A new window will pop up where you can sign up to Pinterest.
steps.description: To sign in, follow the steps below. Click on Log In Now. Enter your login details, or login with Facebook, Google+ or Twitter, then click "Log In," and you're done.

steps.headline: Enter the board that you want your pin in.
Enter a description about the wikiHow article (optional).
Pin your wikiHow article to your Pinterest account.
Find the wikiHow article you want to share to Twitter.
Find on the right side of the page a box that says "Share," then click on the blue "Tweet" button.
A new window will pop up, where you have to enter your log in details.
The window will close, and you're done!

text: Sharing to Facebook Find the wikiHow article you wish to share to Facebook.  Look for, on the right side of the page, a bar that has "Share" and has the four share buttons in it. Click on the blue button that says "Like," with a thumbs up with it. A new window will pop up, where you will be required to enter your Facebook email and password and enter those.  Click on "Log In."  The window will close, and you're done!  Sharing to Pinterest Visit the wikiHow article that you want to share to Pinterest.  Find on the right side of the page, a box with a title of "Share," and then find the button with "Pin It," and click on it.  A new window will pop up where you can sign up to Pinterest. To sign in, follow the steps below. Click on Log In Now. Enter your login details, or login with Facebook, Google+ or Twitter, then click "Log In," and you're done. Enter the board that you want your pin in.  Enter a description about the wikiHow article (optional).  Pin your wikiHow article to your Pinterest account. By clicking on "Pin It." Done!  Sharing to Twitter Find the wikiHow article you want to share to Twitter.  Find on the right side of the page a box that says "Share," then click on the blue "Tweet" button.  A new window will pop up, where you have to enter your log in details.  Click "Log in and Tweet."  The window will close, and you're done!
sentences: Sharing to Facebook Find the wikiHow article you wish to share to Facebook.
Look for, on the right side of the page, a bar that has "Share" and has the four share buttons in it.
Click on the blue button that says "Like," with a thumbs up with it.
A new window will pop up, where you will be required to enter your Facebook email and password and enter those.
Click on "Log In."
The window will close, and you're done!
Sharing to Pinterest Visit the wikiHow article that you want to share to Pinterest.
Find on the right side of the page, a box with a title of "Share," and then find the button with "Pin It," and click on it.
A new window will pop up where you can sign up to Pinterest.
To sign in, follow the steps below.
Click on Log In Now.
Enter your login details, or login with Facebook, Google+ or Twitter, then click "Log In," and you're done.
Enter the board that you want your pin in.
Enter a description about the wikiHow article (optional).
Pin your wikiHow article to your Pinterest account.
By clicking on "Pin It."
Done!
Sharing to Twitter Find the wikiHow article you want to share to Twitter.
Find on the right side of the page a box that says "Share," then click on the blue "Tweet" button.
A new window will pop up, where you have to enter your log in details.
Click "Log in and Tweet."
The window will close, and you're done!
